file_content.text: I found the files about the Empire's stealth weapon research, but something's wrong. They're starting to erase themselves.
I used turbolift data cards all the time when I was here. They work with computers, too....
Maybe we can transfer the files onto the data card Remmy gave us. Copy them before they get deleted....
Worked like a charm. Pretty amazing, huh, gorgeous?
How did I ever get by without you?
[Flirt] Aren't you always?
Best not to think about it. Those bad old days are over.
And what do you know? It worked. Not bad, huh?
That was fast thinking. Well done.
Nice work, Doc.
"Fast thinking" is my middle name.
We still have a cloaking device to find.
We're not out of this yet.
Relax. What could possibly go wrong?
Don't break your arm patting yourself on the back.
Get over yourself.
You're so feisty. I like feisty.
Oh, come on. You were impressed.
Hmm. You suppose the Empire knows we're here?
[The terminal is silent.]
